addComment(uint256,string).details: Add a comment to a post.

enroll(string,string,string).details: Enrolls a user profile and their account address.

getPost(uint256).return: a array with postId, title, content, votes, author, accountAddress (of author).

getUserProfile().details: Get a user profile and their account address.
getUserProfile().return: a array of firstName, lastName and email of a User.

makeDownVote(uint256).details: Vote down a post, if you're not the author.

makeUpVote(uint256).details: Vote up a post, if you're not the author.
